Title: My wifes memories
Cons: havent found out how to shorten the view display of a photo that has been taken so that you can go right to the next shot, minor thing my wife loves the camara
Pros: shutter speed is very nice, low light focus is nice also, she trueley loves the settings for differant areas and types of photos, the zoom is very cool
Comments: great price and combo buy, also bought a 512mb card lots of picts

Title: Awesome Camera for the Price
Cons: You need to have real good rechargeable batteries. other than that, the darn thing works great.
Pros: awesome pictures, nice quality, very user friendly, good videos<you need to play them with quicktime in your pc though> very stylish.
Comments: I've a 512 MB memory card.Can take a whole lot of pics and some good videos, haven't filled it up yet. so a good investment, a great B-day present, and a happy wife.

Title: Great camera!
Cons: The pure size of it, it's too big to throw in your pocket like a normal sized digital camera because of the 10X zoom capabilities.
Pros: Great camera, takes good pictures, good motion pictures.  Nice clarity, even takes decent video!

Title: Good camera
Cons: Prefer to have a viewfinder, but that's the price of 10x zoom.  A little large, but again that's due to the quality of the lens and AA batteries.  Not a party or pocket camera, more of a light travel camera.
Pros: Menu system is easy to use.  Picture quality is great for the size of the photo; people often think I have several more megapixals. Uses AA batteries (handy when travelling around the world), like 10x zoom
Comments: Overall very happy with Kodak.  Great price for the product.  Good balance between small party/friends camera and professional camera

Title: Now can get it Bundled
Cons: I haven't found any problems with this camera.
Pros: By itself, this is a great camera, but you can also buy it in a bundle. The bundle includes a Series 3 Kodak Photo Printer, Rechargeable batteries, the camera, connection cords and a 10-page sample pack of paper.  The camera charges when docked on the photo printer.  The prints are as good as film cameras and better than some of the prints you can have made at stores.  The charge on the batteries lasts for several hundred photos.  The camera is pretty simple to use even for a novice.  The menus are clear and understandable.  In night shots, the LCD displays grainy pictures, but when it flashes, the picture taken is clear.  You have the ability to customize settings (ISO Speed, White Balance, etc.) as you would on your film camera if you want.  Also, you can take a burst of images; either four at a time or three at a time.
Comments: Great camera, great price, great reviews.

Cons: None yet
Pros: This Camera rocks. The zoom is great.
Comments: Shipping was super fast as usual. Newegg rocks

Title: Great Camera
Cons: No cons other than it doesnt come with rechargeable batteries, but most cameras dont anyways.
Pros: Ive had problems with digital cameras in the past so was always afraid to invest a little cash into one.  But I must say for the price this camera is a great deal.  I finally have ridded myself of the red eyes in my 3 year old with crystal clear pictures.  Its has a nice LCD screen and all the picture modes are nice as well.

Title: Great camera
Cons: Does not include a rechargable battery. Even my little point and shoot Kodak included a rechargable.
Pros: Great optical zoom, pop-up flash, great functionality and adjustability.

Title: Decent camera
Cons: No image stabilizer.  Poor auto-exposure.  Slow focus that is not always accurate.  Low light focus is bad even with the focus assist light.
Pros: Nice 10x zoom.  Good battery life on NIMH AA batteries.  Fast flash recycle time.  Good color reproduction.

Title: Excellent camera
Cons: You have to purchase the dock station separately, as opposed to some of the Kodak's com with them. Not really a con since you can still use the usb, but if you do not have a photo printer, then you have to purchase one. It would probably be better anyway.
Pros: Great camera. This is our first digital camera and I am impressed. Does not have all the features of higher end cameras, but enough to do alot of things with. The pictures are very impressive, very clear. My Father has the 740 and his has a few more options, but the pictures are clearer on this one.
